item.title: 风险投资老兵伊桑-库兹韦尔谈初创企业的现状
item.description: 2010 年代，在廉价资金和廉价计算能力的推动下，我们看到了风险投资领域令人难以置信的蓬勃发展。时至今日，许多事情看起来已大不相同。我们已不再处于ZIRP时代。计算能力已成为稀缺资源，尤其是在人工智能领域。那么，从一位资深风险投资人的角度来看，今天的情况有什么不同呢？本期节目于 11 月在旧金山现场录制，我们采访了人工智能公司的创始人伊桑-库兹韦尔（Ethan Kurzweil）。【原文：In the 2010s, we saw an incredible boom in the venture capital space, fueled in part by cheap capital as well as cheap compute. Fast forward to today, and many things look very different. We're not in the ZIRP era anymore. And computing power has become a scarce resource, particularly when it comes to AI. So how do things look different today from the perspective of a veteran venture capitalist? In this episode, recorded live in San Francisco in November, we speak to Ethan Kurzweil, a founder an】

item.title: 毛里求斯总理称经济状况比预期更糟
item.description: 纳文钱德拉-拉姆古兰（Navinchandra Ramgoolam）总理表示，正在进行的毛里求斯公共财政审计证明情况比预期的要糟糕。【原文：An ongoing audit of Mauritius public finances is proving to be worse than anticipated, Prime Minister Navinchandra Ramgoolam said.】

item.title: 特朗普向美元的潜在挑战者发出预警信号
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普直接以美元权力捍卫者的身份投入行动，向一个几乎不存在的敌人猛烈开火。【原文：Donald Trump has jumped straight into action as the defender of dollar power, training some heavy fire on an enemy that barely even exists.】

item.title: 波兰总统候选人呼吁格拉平斯基降低利率
item.description: 波兰主要执政党的总统候选人在周六的竞选活动中呼吁央行行长降低利率并停止干预经济。【原文：The presidential candidate of Poland’s main ruling party kicked off his campaign on Saturday by calling on the central bank governor to lower interest rates and stop interfering with the economy.】

item.title: 毛里求斯中央银行希望投资基金脱离资产负债表
item.description: 毛里求斯银行行长拉玛-克里希纳-西塔宁（Rama Krishna Sithanen）周六在首都路易港告诉记者，毛里求斯银行希望找到一种方法，结束其在科维德疫情期间设立的投资基金中的角色。【原文：The Bank of Mauritius wants to find a way to wind down its role in an investment fund set up during the Covid pandemic, Governor Rama Krishna Sithanen told reporters in the capital, Port Louis, on Saturday.】

item.title: 华尔街周刊评估风险：从贸易、飓风到港口
item.description:
本周我们讲述了有关美国贸易逆差、房屋保险价格上涨的原因以及美国港口效率低下的故事。【原文：

This week we told stories about the US balance of trade deficit, what's driving up the price of home insurance, and the inefficiency of US ports.

】

item.title: 大型科技公司利润增长放缓，投资者寻找新事物
item.description: 股市的增长引擎正在熄火。【原文：The stock market’s growth engine is running on fumes.】

item.title: 在特朗普经济下，"动物精神 "可能面临冷酷现实
item.description: 纯粹的企业主乐观情绪能否转化为经济加速？明年，随着唐纳德-特朗普和他的助手们第二次掌权，美国可能会迎来对这一命题的终极考验。【原文：Can pure business-owner optimism translate into economic acceleration? Next year may offer the ultimate test of that proposition in America, as Donald Trump and his aides take the reins for a second time.】

item.title: 执政党抵制后，韩国弹劾投票仍在继续
item.description: 韩国总统尹锡烈周六仍在等待针对他的弹劾投票的最终结果，此前反对党将投票过程搁置，希望有更多执政党成员加入他们的事业。【原文：South Korean President Yoon Suk Yeol was still waiting for the final result of an impeachment vote against him on Saturday, after the opposition left the voting process in limbo in the hope that more ruling party members would join their cause.】

item.title: 绘制全球经济地图：法国政府倒台
item.description: 极右翼领导人玛丽娜-勒庞（Marine Le Pen）与左翼联盟联手推翻了法国政府，使法国陷入长期动荡，这可能会进一步扰乱投资者的情绪。【原文：Far-right leader Marine Le Pen teamed up with a left-wing coalition to topple the French government, pitching the country into a prolonged period of turbulence that’s likely to further unsettle investors.】

item.title: 法国股市在经历 2010 年以来最糟糕的一年后将继续遭受重创
item.description: 在连续数月表现不佳之后，法国股市本周迎来了一波令人欣慰的反弹。但这可能只是昙花一现，因为法国的政治危机将持续下去，而该国捉襟见肘的公共财政将使长期投资者望而却步。【原文：French stocks enjoyed a brisk relief rally this week after months of underperformance. But this could turn out to be a blip as France’s political crisis is set to drag on while the country’s stretched public finances will keep long-term investors at bay.】

item.title: Chappal Energies 完成对 Equinor 尼日利亚分公司的收购
item.description: 查帕尔能源公司（Chappal Energies）已完成对挪威 Equinor ASA 旗下 Equinor 尼日利亚能源公司（Equinor Nigeria Energy Company）的收购，该交易于 2023 年首次宣布。【原文：Chappal Energies has completed the acquisition of Equinor Nigeria Energy Company, a unit of Norway-based Equinor ASA, a transaction first announced in 2023.】

item.title: 惠誉上调匈牙利债务展望，匈牙利评级获缓和
item.description: 惠誉国际评级公司（Fitch Ratings）将匈牙利的评级展望从负面转为稳定，肯定了匈牙利总理维克托-欧尔班（Viktor Orban）为扭转该国经济下滑所做的一些努力。【原文：Fitch Ratings moved Hungary to a stable outlook from negative, acknowledging some of Prime Minister Viktor Orban’s efforts to reverse the country’s economic slide.】

item.title: 中国在停购 6 个月后于 11 月恢复购买黄金储备
item.description: 中国人民银行的数据显示，中国 11 月底的黄金储备从一个月前的 7280 万金衡制盎司增至 7296 万金衡制盎司。【原文：China’s end-November gold reserves rose to 72.96 million fine troy ounces from 72.8 million fine troy ounces a month ago, according to data from the People’s Bank of China.】

item.title: 英国准备应对时速 90 英里的狂风，数百万人被敦促留在室内
item.description: 由于英国正准备应对 "达拉风 "带来的时速高达 90 英里的狂风，三百万人被敦促留在室内。【原文：Three million people have been urged to stay indoors as the UK braces for winds of up to 90mph brought on by Storm Darragh.】

item.title: 新世界的首席执行官旋转门显示了接班人的挑战
item.description: 在 11 月 29 日的员工大会上，香港亿万富翁郑家纯向聚集在一起的数百名员工介绍了他的新任首席执行官人选，并承诺黄永宏将帮助这家陷入困境的房地产开发商削减债务，重建其住宅房地产项目。【原文：In a town-hall meeting on Nov. 29, Hong Kong billionaire Henry Cheng introduced his new pick for Chief Executive Officer to the hundreds of employees gathered virtually, pledging that Echo Huang would help the ailing property developer cut debt and rebuild its residential property pipeline.】

item.title: 迪士尼最大游轮携漫威英雄登陆亚洲
item.description: 迪斯尼公司首艘亚洲游轮的船票将于下周开始发售，这家娱乐业巨头将利用新加坡旅游业的蓬勃发展，实现其游轮业务的宏伟目标。【原文：Tickets for a voyage on board Walt Disney Co.’s first Asia-based cruise ship go on sale next week, as the entertainment giant takes advantage of a tourism boom in Singapore to realize ambitious goals for its cruise business.】

item.title: 万亿美元差距显示韩国和台湾股市命运迥异
item.description: 随着韩国陷入政治混乱，其股票市场有可能进一步落后于主要的科技竞争对手台湾，而台湾正沉浸在全球人工智能繁荣的荣耀之中。【原文：As South Korea descends into political chaos, its equity market risks falling further behind major tech rival Taiwan, which is basking in the glory of the global artificial intelligence boom.】

item.title: 德国肖尔茨呼吁欧盟加强对钢铁进口的保护
item.description: 德国总理奥拉夫-肖尔茨（Olaf Scholz）呼吁欧盟对钢铁进口采取更强有力的措施，并表示他希望确保德国钢铁行业的长远发展。【原文：Chancellor Olaf Scholz called for stronger European Union measures against steel imports, saying he wants to secure the industry’s long-term future in Germany.】

item.title: 纽约警方发现与杀害首席执行官的凶手所携带背包描述相符的背包
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，纽约警察局发现了一个灰色背包，与杀害医疗保险公司高管布莱恩-汤普森的凶手所背的背包特征相符。【原文：The New York Police Department found a gray backpack matching the description of one carried by the killer of health insurance executive Brian Thompson, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 展望资本的私人信贷基金被 S&P 下调为 "垃圾 "级
item.description: S&P全球评级公司将Prospect Capital Corp.的评级下调至BB+，也就是下调至垃圾级，理由是这家价值76亿美元的私人信贷基金出现亏损，信贷质量下降。【原文：S&P Global Ratings lowered its rating on Prospect Capital Corp. to BB+, or one step into junk territory, citing losses and a deterioration in credit quality for the $7.6 billion private credit fund.】

item.title: 中美科技大战催生以人工智能和芯片为基础的亚洲繁荣城镇
item.description:
科技投资的加速涌入正在改变马来西亚和越南的地方经济。【原文：

An accelerating influx of tech investment is transforming local economies in Malaysia and Vietnam.

】

item.title: 特朗普解雇加密与人工智能沙皇 长期批评科技监管
item.description:
直到现在，这位风险投资家和坚定的特朗普支持者还不是加密货币或人工智能领域的重要参与者。【原文：

Until now, the venture capitalist and staunch Trump supporter hasn’t been a key player in either crypto or AI.

】

item.title: 内塔尼亚胡将墨尔本纵火案与 "反以色列 "立场联系起来
item.description: 以色列总理本雅明-内塔尼亚胡暗示澳大利亚政府的 "极端反以色列 "立场助长了本周对墨尔本犹太教堂的明显纵火袭击。【原文：Israel Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu suggested the Australian government’s “extreme anti-Israeli” stance helped incite an apparent arson attack on a Melbourne synagogue this week.】

item.title: 如果 TikTok 在美国因禁令而败诉怎么办？
item.description: TikTok 正朝着在美国全国范围内禁止使用的方向前进。【原文：TikTok is barreling toward a nationwide ban in the US.】

item.title: CFPB 要求对谷歌支付部门行使监管权
item.description: 消费者金融保护局不顾谷歌支付公司的反对，发布了一项命令，确立了对该公司的监管权，该机构扩大了对非银行金融平台的监管范围。【原文：The Consumer Financial Protection Bureau issued an order establishing supervisory authority over Google Payment Corp., despite the company’s objections, as the agency extends its oversight of nonbank financial platforms.】

item.title: 指数调整后，Apollo 和 Workday 将加入 S&P 500 指数
item.description: 在最新的季度权重变化中，阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management Inc.【原文：Apollo Global Management Inc. and Workday Inc. have been added to the S&P 500 index in the latest quarterly weighting change.】

item.title: NOS 称，ASML 前员工涉嫌窃取商业机密
item.description: 据荷兰公共广播公司 NOS 报道，ASML Holding NV 的一名前雇员因涉嫌窃取商业机密而在荷兰面临诉讼，这是这家先进芯片制造设备制造商的最新一起违规事件。【原文：A former ASML Holding NV employee is facing a lawsuit in the Netherlands over suspected theft of trade secrets, according to Dutch public broadcaster NOS, in the latest breach of the maker of advanced chip-manufacturing equipment.】

item.title: 超微公司获纳斯达克延期至二月提交申请
item.description: 超微计算机公司（Super Micro Computer Inc.【原文：Super Micro Computer Inc. said Nasdaq Inc. has granted the company additional time to become compliant with listing rules, easing the near-term risk that the embattled server maker would be delisted.】

item.title: 国防初创公司 Palantir 和 Anduril 将保存战场数据以训练人工智能模型
item.description: 软件公司帕兰提尔科技公司（Palantir Technologies Inc.【原文：Software company Palantir Technologies Inc. and weapons maker Anduril Industries Inc. plan to accelerate the use of artificial intelligence in the US military and are inviting other companies to join the effort.】
